channel.description: Recent content in contacts on Andrea Cirillo

item.title: contacts
item.description: I do not have a general purposes email ( I actually used to have one but it got irredeemably full of spam) but I carefully crafted three main channels to get exposed to all relevant and promising opportunities. You can find them below: Proposals of Blog Post/Speaches author at andreacirillo.com Collaboration proposals you can use my linkedin profile to get in touch with me for proposals of every kind of collaboration, either requesting to connect or sending inmail messages: linkedin profile
